education.degree: Bachelor's degree in computer and systems Engineering
details: CS technical member at IEEE Zagazig Student Chapter
Courses: computer organization, operating systems, Data structure and Algorithms, Object-oriented programming, Learning Skills through Case Studies

responsibilities: Migrated Mapping System: Transitioned the app's mapping infrastructure to Mapbox for Flutter, enabling advanced geolocation features and improving scalability
Developed Dynamic Map Reveal Feature: Implemented an engaging map reveal system that dynamically unfolds as users explore, enhancing interactivity and user engagement
Optimized POI Rendering: Enhanced the rendering of Points of Interest (POI) for secret and discovered places, improving performance and visual clarity
Optimized Performance: Improved overall app responsiveness and performance to deliver a seamless user experience during GPS-driven real-world exploration

Technologies used: Flutter framework, clean Architecture, Bloc/cubit as State Management, Firebase/Firestore technologies, Mapbox integration, GeoJSON file handling, Responsive Flutter UI, Error Handling, Dependency Injection and singleton pattern
Collaborated closely with clients to understand project objectives and requirements
Developed cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart and ensuring responsive design across various devices and screen sizes
Assisted with testing, bug fixing, debugging to optimize app performance

Technologies used: Flutter framework, MVVM and clean Architecture, Firebase/Firestore technologies, RESTful APIs, Google Maps / Mapbox integration, Bloc as State Management, Dependency Injection and singleton pattern

Projects.name: Hyper Deal
Projects.description: A smart shopping app that helps users find the best supermarket deals and save money on groceries in Kuwait
features: Users can search for products by category or name, compare prices across multiple stores, and share deals or shopping lists with friends and family
The app ensures that users always get the best prices available, making informed shopping decisions easier and more convenient
Projects.technologies: Flutter framework, MVVM and clean Architecture, Bloc as State Management, RESTful APIs, Responsive Flutter UI, pagination, Error Handling, CI/CD, Dependency Injection and singleton pattern

Projects.name: School Go
Projects.description: An app that helps both schools and parents track the safety of students during their school bus trip
features: Driver Part: Helps to track the bus movement at all times, in regard to route and speed and manage students picking and dropping status

Parent Part: Track the bus movement to know exactly when it will reach the desired destination using Google Maps, get notifications about students, inform school about absence, change pickup/drop-off points
Projects.technologies: Flutter framework, clean Architecture, Firebase technologies, Notifications handling, Google Maps APIs, Bloc as State Management, RESTful APIs, Responsive Flutter UI, pagination, Error Handling, Dependency Injection and singleton pattern

Contributions.name: Voice message package
Contributions.description: Voicey is a flutter package to play voice messages in chats with seeking capability by dragging on voice noises
